Package com.hazelcast.durableexecutor

This package contains DurableExecutorService functionality for Hazelcast.
The DurableExecutorService extends the ExecutorService and provides additional methods like executing tasks on a member who is owner of a specific key. DurableExecutorService also provides a way to retrieve the result of an execution with the given taskId.

Since:
3.7
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    DurableExecutorService
    Durable implementation of ExecutorService.
    DurableExecutorServiceFuture<V>
    A Future where one can obtain the task ID for tracking the response.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    StaleTaskIdException
    An RuntimeException that is thrown when retrieving the result of a task via DurableExecutorService if the result of the task is overwritten.
